title: Complete development environment setup and testing
description: Ensure all tooling works end-to-end. Complete any remaining Beads setup, verify all constitutional requirements (TypeScript, type safety, Better-T-Stack compatibility), and ensure development workflow is fully functional. Target: Complete Phase 1 development environment.

title: Implement complete preset system with validation
description: Fully implement all 6 presets (saas, ecommerce, blog, devtool, portfolio, minimal) with end-to-end testing. Add preset validation, override system, custom preset creation. Ensure each preset generates working projects. Target: Complete preset system with validation.

title: Create PBS documentation template system
description: Implement PBS documentation templates: PBS_MASTER_SYSTEM.md template, CLAUDE.md template, constitution.md template, complete docs/ structure templates, ARCHITECTURE.md, CHANGELOG.md, PROJECT_STATUS.md templates. Support PBS level selections from wizard. Target: Complete PBS documentation scaffolding.

title: Prepare for npm publishing and v1.0 release
description: Prepare CLI for public release: package.json optimization, version management, npm publishing setup, GitHub releases, CI/CD for automated publishing, security auditing, performance optimization. Target: Ready for npm publish as create-karetech-stack.

title: Add configuration import/export functionality
description: Implement ability to save and load wizard configurations. Add --config flag to CLI, support for .karetech-config.json files, configuration validation and merging. Enable sharing and reusing project configurations. Target: Complete config management system for wizard.

title: Create basic project template generation system
description: EJS-based template system for file generation. Implement template engine to generate scaffolded projects based on wizard configuration. Create basic template structure for Better-T-Stack foundation. Target: Functional template generation system for Phase 1.

title: Create comprehensive E2E testing suite
description: Implement complete E2E testing covering all wizard combinations: all presets × all options testing, edge cases, error scenarios, configuration validation. Test CLI on different platforms, validate generated projects. Target: Complete CLI testing coverage.

title: Complete all 7-step wizard implementations
description: Enhance existing wizard to fully implement all 7 steps: 1) Project Info ✅, 2) Core Stack ✅, 3) Design ✅, 4) Testing ✅, 5) DevOps ✅, 6) AI Workflow ✅, 7) Extras ✅. Add missing prompt options, enhance UX, add conditional logic, improve error handling. Target: Complete wizard implementation with all options from FORK_PLAN.md.

title: Create end-to-end preset testing system
description: Implement automated testing for all 6 presets. Test each preset generates working projects with: bun dev works, bun build succeeds, all dependencies install, TypeScript compiles, tests run. Add preset validation CI. Target: Automated preset testing ensuring quality.

title: Create Claude Code configuration templates
description: Implement .claude/ directory templates: settings.json, agents/, commands/, hooks/, skills/ structure. Create MCP server configurations, hook scripts, subagent definitions. Support AI workflow wizard selections. Target: Complete Claude Code integration scaffolding.

title: Create Better-T-Stack base template system
description: Implement EJS template system for generating Better-T-Stack projects. Create base templates for: package.json, tsconfig.json, apps/web, apps/server, packages/db, packages/auth. Implement template rendering engine and file generation logic. Target: Functional base scaffolding system.

title: Create complete project documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation: README.md with usage examples, API documentation, troubleshooting guide, contribution guidelines, architecture documentation. Create website/landing page. Target: Complete project documentation for public release.

title: Implement project info prompts (step 1 of wizard)
description: First step of 7-step wizard from FORK_PLAN.md. Implement project name, description, author inputs with validation. Include preset selection functionality. Target: Complete Step 1 - Project Info with proper validation and preset integration.

title: Add comprehensive input validation system
description: Robust validation following constitutional type safety principles. Implement validation for all prompt inputs across the 7-step wizard. Ensure TypeScript strict mode compliance and prevent invalid configurations. Target: Comprehensive validation system for all wizard steps.

title: Implement complete CLI structure with Clack prompts
description: Enhance src/index.ts with full 7-step wizard flow from placeholder implementation. Replace TODO sections (lines 35-56) with complete wizard including: 1) Project Info, 2) Core Stack, 3) Design, 4) Testing, 5) DevOps, 6) AI Workflow, 7) Extras. Target: Replace placeholder with full wizard based on FORK_PLAN.md specifications.

title: Create shadcn/ui theme and design templates
description: Implement shadcn/ui v4 theme templates for all 5 styles (vega, nova, maia, lyra, mira). Create components.json configs, CSS variables, Tailwind configurations, font integrations, color scheme variations. Support all design wizard selections. Target: Complete design system template generation.

title: Implement config serialization and storage system
description: Create system to serialize and store wizard configuration for project generation. Implement JSON/YAML config output and validation. Support config file export for template generation. Target: Complete configuration management for wizard output.

title: Create testing framework templates
description: Implement templates for E2E testing setup: Playwright configuration, Puppeteer setup, test examples, Page Object Model patterns, GitHub Actions testing workflows. Support wizard testing selections. Target: Complete testing template system for all testing options.

title: Create DevOps and deployment templates
description: Implement Docker and CI/CD templates: Dockerfile (multi-stage, <200MB), docker-compose.yml, GitHub Actions workflows (ci.yml, deploy.yml, preview.yml), Vercel configuration, environment variable templates. Target: Complete DevOps template system for all deployment options.
